thread.title: Scott Disick seen partying with 18-year-old model in NYC
thread.title_full: Scott Disick seen partying with 18-year-old model in NYC - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Scott Disick seen partying with 18-year-old model in NYC
text:
Scott Disick was spotted out at an East Village bar Wednesday night with a new blond pal. Chris Weeks/Getty Images for Calvin Klein Scott Disick and Kourtney Kardashian split up in July after nine years together. Previous Next Enlarge Scott Disick seems to have discovered that blondes really do have more fun.
Kourtney Kardashian’s ex was spotted hanging out with a mystery blond in New York City on Wednesday, identified by Entertainment Tonight as 18-year-old model/artist Lindsay Vrckovnik.
The Canadian teen is currently enrolled at New York’s Parsons School of Design, and a Facebook post indicates that she graduated from high school in May.
Disick, 32, and his ladyfriend partied together from Wednesday afternoon until 6 a.m. the next day, making stops at hotspots such as 1 OAK nightclub and Soho House, TMZ reports.
In an interview with the blog Daughter Runs in April, Vrckovnik said that her inspiration for her artwork and photography comes from "her environment, and the people I'm surrounded by."
"Nothing inspires me more than being in a creative environment, or seeing someone engaging in something they're passionate about (thus why NYC is the dream ahhh)."
“Hooray for leaving everything behind for New York,” she said about moving to the city to pursue her dreams.
As for Disick, he was left behind by Kardashian in July after photos emerged of him getting cozy with an ex-girlfriend.
Since their split, Disick has mostly continued his partying ways , while Kardashian has focused on their three children: Mason, 5, Penelope, 3, and Reign, 9 months.
View Gallery Celebrity breakups A day after Disick partied with a woman close to half his age, his ex-partner posted a selfie of herself alone in bed.
“I love the silent hour of night,” Kardashian captioned the pic, quoting writer Anne Bronte.
